Name: MeasurementSchemeName
Description: A name for the MeasurementScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the scheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the MeasurementItemScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: MeasurementSchemeReference
Description: Allows for the inclusion of another MeasurementItemScheme by reference.

Name: MeasurementGroupReference
Description: Contains a group of MeasurementItems, which may be ordered or hierarchical.
